name: Judge Dredd 95
description: Respect the badge! Dredd is back, and he's cleaning up the streets of Mega-City One again in this classic shoot-em-up platformer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 2000, XP or Vista Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 750 MB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
